catalogUrl.title: Camel Catalog URL
catalogUrl.description: URL that points to the `index.json` file from the Kaoto Camel Catalog. Leave it empty to use the embedded catalog.

nodeLabel.title: Node label to display in canvas
nodeLabel.description: Node label, which will be used for nodes in the canvas. Can be either `description` or `id`. If `description` is selected, it will be displayed only if it is available, otherwise `id` will be displayed by default.

nodeToolbarTrigger.title: Open Node toolbar
nodeToolbarTrigger.description: Choose when to open the Node toolbar. Can be either `onHover` or `onSelection`. If `onHover` is selected, the toolbar will be automatically open upon hovering a node, otherwise, it will be open when selecting a node

colorScheme.title: Color scheme
colorScheme.description: Choose the color scheme for the UI. Can be either `auto`, `light`, or `dark`

canvasLayoutDirection.title: Canvas layout direction
canvasLayoutDirection.description: Choose the canvas layout behavior. `SelectInCanvas` lets users toggle layout via canvas buttons. `Horizontal` forces horizontal layout (buttons hidden). `Vertical` forces vertical layout (buttons hidden).

apicurioRegistryUrl.title: Apicurio Registry URL
apicurioRegistryUrl.description: URL that points to Apicurio Registry.

customMediaTypes.title: Custom media types
customMediaTypes.description: These values are available in Rest DSL Consumes/Produces fields. Add media type (e.g., application/vnd.api+json)

enableDragAndDrop.title: Enable Drag & Drop
enableDragAndDrop.description: Control whether to enable drag and drop feature
